mapper.update:
update KQDS_JZQK
regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reggoal = #{reggoal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jzmd = #{jzmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

dzdata = #{dzdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dzregno = #{dzregno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
istx = #{istx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_JZQK set regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reggoal = #{reggoal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jzmd = #{jzmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fzdata = #{fzdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dzdata = #{dzdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dzregno = #{dzregno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, istx = #{istx,jdbcType=INTEGER} where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) from KQDS_JZQK where regno = #{_parameter} and (reggoal is not null and reggoal != '')
mapper.delete: delete from KQDS_JZQK where regno = #{regno} and doctor = #{doctor} and (reggoal is null or reggoal = '')
delete from KQDS_JZQK where regno = #{_parameter} and (reggoal is null or reggoal = '')
mapper.select: select DISTINCT j.seq_id, j.regno, j.reggoal, j.jzmd, j.remark, j.doctor, j.createtime, j.createuser, j.organization, j.fzdata, j.dzdata, j.dzregno, j.istx, r.usercode from KQDS_JZQK j left join KQDS_REG r on r.seq_id = j.regno where r.usercode in (${_parameter})
